name: adc_gtm_poolmember_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()



def getGTMPoolMemberList():
    '''
    To get the list of GTM Pool member

    '''

    gtm_pool_member_list = []
    db_filter = {'code': 'gpm'}
    adc_gtm_pool_member_list = connect_db.appviewx.ro.find(db_filter)
    for device in adc_gtm_pool_member_list:
        gtm_pool_member_list.append(device)
    return gtm_pool_member_list
description: To get a list of GTM poolmember
_keywords: To get a list of GTM poolmember
